properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_BOOK_GENRE( GENRE_NO , GENRE_NAME , LOCATION_PLACE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GENRE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
SELECT GENRE_NO , GENRE_NAME , LOCATION_PLACE FROM TB_BOOK_GENRE ORDER BY GENRE_NO ASC
UPDATE TB_BOOK_GENRE SET LOCATION_PLACE =? WHERE GENRE_NAME =?
DELETE FROM TB_BOOK_GENRE WHERE GENRE_NAME = ? AND LOCATION_PLACE = ?
